title: Road to Riches
overview: Heading out on his classic motorcycle, Lucas is invited into homes to cast his trained eye over vintage items and determine their potential worth and the best way to sell them. It's all about getting the most bric for the brac for the owners, even if it means restoring some items to do so. From mid-century furniture to clothing and collectables, every house has an estimated $5000 worth of unwanted goods that can be liquidated â€“ and Lucas is just the man to do it!
